events.name: The Sundering
events.description: A catastrophic event where an archmage attempted to tear the veil between worlds, causing reality to fracture in certain areas.
events.time_period: 300 years ago, during the Age of Arcanum
events.key_figures: Archmage Malakar (the instigator), High Priestess Elara (who helped contain it), The Silent Council (who passed judgment)
events.consequences: Creation of the Blighted Marshes, formation of the Starfall Crater, establishment of the Guild of Arcane Concordance to regulate magic
events.causes: Malakar's obsession with contacting eldritch beings, misuse of ancient artifacts, failure of magical safeguards
events.legacy: Magic is now heavily regulated, fear of arcane catastrophes persists, some areas remain dangerously unstable
